AI Description: R Crayon is an R package that provides colored terminal output for R on supported terminals. It allows users to add colors to R outputs in the console, making it easier to differentiate between different types of information.
Core Features: Provides Colored Terminal Output For R On Supported Terminals, Allows Users To Customize The Color Of R Outputs In The Console, Facilitates Easier Differentiation Of Information With Colored Text
General Tags: R Package, Colored Terminal Output, Data Visualization, Programming Tool
